We are working on a mini grammar for Skolt Sámi designed especially for users of Oahpa!-nuõrti.
The materials we have used include:

ul.li: Feist, T. 2010: A grammar of Skolt Saami. Manchester.
Moshnikoff, S. / Moshnikoff J. / Koponen 2009: Koltansaamen koulukielioppi. Inari.
Sammallahti, P. / Mosnikoff, J. 1991: Suomi-koltansaame-sanakirja. Utsjoki.

body.p: Here is a link to our paradigm generator where you can type in a word and get its various word forms.

body.p: Please note that our ressources are at a developmental stage and may contain errors. We work on improving them. If you have comments or criticism, feel free to contact us (oahpa@hum.uit.no).
